title: Curriculum of Strategy: Artistry of War
tags: curriculum of strategy artistry of war
content:
War, found inside the book "The Red Knight's Final Strategem". The book is found through a door opened via finding a hidden button in the room where you enter the Sorcerous Vault below Sorcerous Sundries in the Lower City. Walk over the invisible walkways to find a locked Display Case containing the book. Read it to gain the scroll.
